description: This file defines a UI component named Badge, which renders a styled badge element with various variants, using class-variance-authority for style variants and utility functions for class name concatenation.

methods.name: Badge({ className, variant, ...props })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a styled badge element with customizable variants and additional properties.

methods.name: badgeVariants
methods.description: A set of style variants for the Badge component, configured with class-variance-authority.
